tag_list: software, entrepreneur, design, start-up, investor, founder, technology, email, messaging, social
overview:
An innovator and lead in product design and development. Has been responsible for setting up manufacturing operations across Singapore, China, and Taiwan. Also responsible for bringing to market software and hardware patent pending products, in particular in some cases for fortune 500 companies.

Has several Patents granted in his name and is continuing to seek opportunities in the consumer technology space.

Is launching a disruptive consumer messaging software venture in 2012
